org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.client.bindings.spi.http

Class AbstractApacheClientHttpInvoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.client.bindings.spi.http.AbstractApacheClientHttpInvoker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpInvoker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheClientHttpInvoker

    public abstract class AbstractApacheClientHttpInvoker
extends Object
implements HttpInvoker
    A HttpInvoker that uses The Apache HTTP client.
